name: Garden Care
description:
My second week of my semester game a week course with a easy garden game.

Theme this week was Durational

Play buy planting seeds into garden holes, water the plant, go to sleep and see if the plant has grown at all!

Credits:

Wind ambience - youtube: Wind - SOUND EFFECTS - Gentle Soft Breeze SFX
